name: Late Night Call
description:
You are a mortuary assistant. You have already finished your shift but there has been a severe thunderstorm late in the evening. Lightning struck next to the morgue. As a result, the power went out in the morgue. Your boss calls you to turn the power back on in the morgue and complete some remaining tasks.

A short horror game.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

[WASD] = Movement

[LShift] = Sprint

[E] = Interactions

[F] = Flashlight toggle

[T] = Taskboard toggle

[B] = ???

[ESC] = Pause game

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Extra:

You can get 4 different endings in the game.

I'm in the first year of game development and this is my first game I've made and published.

Diëgo Mulder: Scripting, menu designing, map designing and animations.

If you would like to support me you can donate any amount for future projects. :)
